name: Sunday (Riker, Ulysses At Sea, Cukia "Sugar" Kimani)
name_original: Sunday (Riker, Ulysses At Sea, Cukia "Sugar" Kimani)
description:
A game by Cukia Kimani, Henrike Lode, Saili Chola

Controls: WASD for walking, left-click for starting and advancing dialogue.

You can walk while talking, but we recommend to finish a conversation before you start a new one or walk too far.

Made for LUDUM DARE 50

Models: Animated Mech Pack
Environment: SurrounDead
